entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Thursday 11 May 2023
